amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Additions; subdivisions; plat; governing body; approve before recording; powers.
amendatorysection.para: No plat of or instruments effecting the subdivision of real property described in section 19-918 shall be recorded or have any force and effect unless the same be approved by the governing body of such municipality or its agent designated pursuant to section 19-916. The governing body of such municipality shall have power, by ordinance, to provide the manner, plan, or method by which real property in any such area may be subdivided, platted, or laid out, including a plan or system for the avenues, streets, or alleys to be laid out within or across the same; and to prohibit the sale or offering for sale of, and the construction of buildings and other improvements on, any lots or parts of real property not subdivided, platted, or laid out as required in sections 19-918 and 19-920.
